author: petervg
title: Treedano: NFTs for mature trees
description: Mature trees have value because they store carbon, anchor ecosystems & improve livability but their only monetary value is as felled lumber.
solution: A Dapp that implements natural capital accounting to tokenize mature trees, reflect their true economic value, and incentivize conservation.
experience:
Rural property owners
Back-country hikers
Cardano4Climate eco-activists
Mobile/Plutus developers
Orcfax lead developer
